definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="explode"><field name="mode">BLOCK</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">7</field></block></value></block></next></block><block type="execute_command" x="233" y="172"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/summon minecraft:fireball ~ ~1 ~ {direction:[0.0,-1,0.0],power:[0.0,-0.5,],ExplosionPower:7}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block><block type="explode" x="-24" y="961"><field name="mode">NONE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></xml>
